experience.title: Analyst, Strategy and Operations Consulting
experience.description: Achievements~• Awarded a Letter of Recommendation by the Director for outstanding performance• Delivered across 5 sectors incl. Infrastructure, Transport, Mobility, Education, and Tribal Development• Worked on 8 proposals and Business Development initiatives, of which 4 converted to full-time projects for the service lineEV Market Assessment ~• Undertook an IFC-funded market assessment for EV adoption under their Eco-Cities program (USD 23B)• Analysed the policy framework across 5 Indian cities to develop a roadmap for EV adoption in India• Benchmarked best practices from 3 geographies (USA, Europe, & China) to address gaps in infrastructure• Recommended pilot projects were rolled out in 3 selected cities of Bhubaneshwar, Thane, and BengaluruPublic Policy Implementation~• Impacted 3.7L+ recipients (21 states & 196 districts) by coordinating implementation of Van Dhan Scheme • Expedited fund disbursement of INR 165Cr by conceptualizing value addition plans for 22 key commodities• 1.1K+ tribal SHGs received the grant fund, of which 200+ have been set up generating revenues of INR 4CrCSR Impact Assessment~• Assessed the CSR impact on 14L+ stakeholders across 18+ states of HDFC Bank’s education initiative • Conducted 50+ Interviews and GDs over 5+ field visits for a sample of 400+ stakeholders on-ground• Implemented 50% reduction in Trainer: Teacher ratio for effective learning outcomes post teacher trainingsThought Paper~• Intellectualized a Thought Leadership focusing on 15+ EV business models across 3 vehicle categories

projects: [{"title":"Mid-term impact assessment of Zero Investment Innovation in Education Initiatives (ZIIEI)","start_date":"Feb 2019","end_date":"Mar 2019","description":"•Conducted a mid-term impact assessment for the CSR Education Initiative (Zero Investment Innovation for Education Initiative) of HDFC Bank for the year 2018-19, with Sri Auobindo Society (SAS) as the implementing agency•Liaised with officials from SAS to collect relevant data for the field visits and impact assessment•Successfully covered 400+ stakeholders on field spanning across 18 States and Union Territories•Conducted Key Informant Interviews (KIIs) and Focused Group Discussions (FGDs) with teachers, principals, and Capacity Building Trainers (CBTs) to map the outreach of the initiative at the ground level, and also to map the learning outcomes among students•Prepared and compiled Impact Assessment Report from data findings and analysis for final submission to the client •Received an appreciation mail from the Client post completion of the project, highlighting ease of communication facilitated and the efficiency exhibited in a time-bound assignment"},{"title":"Social Impact Value Framework","start_date":"Jun 2017","end_date":"Aug 2017","description":"•Analyzed 10+ Impact Assessment Tools to derive qualitative, quantitative, and financial parameters along the Impact Value Chain for assessment •Researched directly under the Managing Director and prepared a detailed report on Impact Investments•Redesigned Social Return on Investment framework incorporating Global Reporting Initiative guidelines and valuation techniques from Social and Natural Capital Protocols"},{"title":"Wise Wall Project","start_date":"Jun 2017","description":"• Refurbished a 300-year old abandoned village with the life stories and life lessons of the villagers, and designed a fellowship program to ensure availability of education opportunities for village children.• Saur marked the first village in the world to be transformed into an art gallery documenting cultural wisdom of the original inhabitants of the village.• Wise Wall Project was covered by 10+ national dailies and 15+ news channels, including Times of India, The Hindu, and Hindustan Times.• The project received recognition from the Government of Uttarakhand for checking migration in the hills."},{"title":"Golden Jubilee Xavier Times","start_date":"Apr 2014","end_date":"Feb 2015","description":"•Mentored a team of 10+ assistant editors to document the magazine’s journey from weekly ‘News and Views’ to the annual edition of Xavier Times, tracing aspects of evolution over 50 years•Appreciated by 15+ notable alumni, including Honorable Finance Minister Mr. Arun Jaitley"}]
